response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We believe its true worth far exceeds $1,000,000, but we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This exceptional opportunity allows you to acquire a masterpiece that could potentially be a significant addition to your collection or business.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require more information about the product, feel free to reach out to me directly. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
